title: Fix Codex adapter: wire BuildLaunchConfig and add interface check
description: Reviewer found: (1) BuildLaunchConfig in launch.go is unused dead code â€” PrepareForLaunch builds the -c flag inline instead of calling it. Wire PrepareForLaunch to use BuildLaunchConfig, or merge them. (2) Missing compile-time interface check: add 'var _ adapter.AgentAdapter = (*CodexAdapter)(nil)' to codex adapter test.
